text:
**Final Match Details:**
The final match of the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament will be played between Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns on July 29 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. The match is scheduled to start at 6 AM IST.

**Road to the Final:**
Both teams finished top in the points table with 11 points each, losing only one game each. They secured their spots in the final by winning the Qualifier and Challenger matches, respectively.

**Live Telecast:**
The live telecast of the final match will be available on the Sony Sports Network in India.

**Context:**
This is the second edition of the Major League Cricket tournament, with MI New York being the champions of the inaugural season. The popularity of cricket in the USA has seen a surge following the national cricket team's success in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.

* The final match of the Major League Cricket tournament is scheduled to take place on Sunday, July 28.
* The start time of the final match is 8:30 PM ET.
* The teams participating in the final match are yet to be determined ( Teams TBA).
* The final match will be broadcast on Willow TV.
* Viewers can also live stream the match on FuboTV with the International Sports Plus channel add-on package.

**Match Result:** San Francisco Unicorns defeated Texas Super Kings by 10 runs in a Challenger clash of the MLC 2024 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas.

**Key Performances:**

* Finn Allen scored a century (101 off 53 balls) for the San Francisco Unicorns, setting a challenging total of 200/6.
* Pat Cummins successfully defended 18 runs in the final over to secure the win for the Unicorns.
* Devon Conway (62*) and Joshua Tromp (56) led the chase for the Texas Super Kings, but fell short of the target.

**Tournament Update:**

* The San Francisco Unicorns advance to the finals and will face the Washington Freedom for the title on Sunday.
* The Texas Super Kings are eliminated from the tournament after their loss in the Challenger.

**Match Result:** San Francisco Unicorns defeated Texas Super Kings by 10 runs in the penultimate match of the 2024 MLC season.

**Score:** San Francisco Unicorns: 200/6 in 20 overs, Texas Super Kings: 190/4 in 20 overs.

**Key Performances:**

* Finn Allen (San Francisco Unicorns): 101 runs in 53 balls with 9 fours and 5 sixes.
* Devon Conway (Texas Super Kings): 62* runs in 38 balls with 7 fours and a six.
* Joshua Tromp (Texas Super Kings): 56 runs in 36 balls with 4 fours and 2 sixes.
* Noor Ahmad (Texas Super Kings): 3/27 in bowling.
* Juanoy Drysdale (San Francisco Unicorns): 2/33 in bowling.

**Next Match:** Texas Super Kings will take on Washington Freedom on Sunday.

**Tournament Update:** San Francisco Unicorns have booked a title clash with Washington Freedom.

**Match Preview:** San Francisco Unicorns will face Texas Super Kings in the Challenger match of MLC 2024 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas on Saturday, July 27, with the winner advancing to the final against Washington Freedom on Monday, July 29.

**Team Performances:** San Francisco Unicorns finished the league stage with five wins in seven matches, while Texas Super Kings won three out of seven matches. The two teams previously met in the round-robin stage, with Texas Super Kings defeating San Francisco Unicorns by seven wickets.

**Squads:** Both teams' squads are listed in the article, with notable players including Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, and Pat Cummins for San Francisco Unicorns, and Devon Conway, Faf du Plessis, and Marcus Stoinis for Texas Super Kings.

**Dream11 Prediction:** A predicted Dream11 team for the match is provided, with Jake Fraser-McGurk as captain and Faf du Plessis as vice-captain.

**Head-to-Head:** Texas Super Kings lead the head-to-head record, having defeated San Francisco Unicorns by seven wickets earlier in the season.

**Match Prediction:** The article predicts that Texas Super Kings will win the match, given their recent form and in-form batting unit.

**Match Details:** The match will start at 6:00 AM IST on Saturday, July 27, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, and will be live-streamed on the Jio Cinema app and website, as well as broadcast on Sony Sports Network on TV.

**Tournament Name:** Global T20 Canada 2024
**Duration:** July 25 - August 11, 2024
**Format:** Six teams will play 7 matches in the group stage, followed by knockouts (Qualifier 1, Eliminator, Qualifier 2, and Final)
**Teams:**

1. Bangla Tigers Mississauga
2. Brampton Wolves
3. Montreal Tigers
4. Surrey Jaguars
5. Toronto Nationals
6. Vancouver Knights

**Schedule:** The first match is on July 25, and the final is on August 11. Matches will start at either 8:30 PM IST or 1:30 PM IST, except for Qualifier 2 and the Final, which will start at 9:30 PM IST.
**Venue:** All matches will be played at the CAA Centre in Brampton.

Note: This summary only includes information about the Global T20 Canada 2024 tournament and does not mention the Major League Cricket (MLC) season in the USA, which was mentioned in the first sentence of the article.

* Washington Freedom (WAF) defeated San Francisco Unicorns (SFU) by 6 wickets in the Qualifier match of the MLC 2024 season at the Grand Prairie Stadium on July 26.
* With this win, Washington Freedom have secured a spot in the final, their maiden MLC final appearance.
* San Francisco Unicorns will face Texas Super Kings (TSK) in the Challenger match, and the winner of that match will play Washington Freedom in the final.
* Travis Head and Glenn Maxwell scored fifties to help Washington chase down the target of 146 runs in 20 overs.
* Rachin Ravindra took 4 wickets for 11 runs in 2.4 overs to help restrict San Francisco Unicorns to 145-10 in 19.1 overs.

* The article reports on Qualifier 1 of the MLC 2024, where Washington Freedom faced San Francisco Unicorns at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* Glenn Maxwell, playing for Washington Freedom, top-scored with an unbeaten 54* off 23 balls, helping his team chase down a target of 146 runs in 15.3 overs with 7 wickets in hand.
* Maxwell hit 5 sixes, including a notable 103-meter six against Pakistani spinner Hassan Khan.
* Travis Head also contributed to Washington's win, scoring 77 off 44 balls.
* With this win, Washington Freedom have secured a spot in the final, while San Francisco Unicorns will face Texas Super Kings in the Challenger (a do-or-die match) to determine the other finalist.

**Match Result:** San Francisco Unicorns defeated Texas Super Kings by 10 runs in the 2024 Challenger on July 26 to reach the finals.

**Key Performances:**

* Fin Allen scored 101 off 53 balls for San Francisco Unicorns.
* Faf du Plessis scored 45 off 22 balls for Texas Super Kings before being dismissed by a stunning one-handed catch by Corey Anderson.
* Devon Conway scored 62* off 38 balls for Texas Super Kings.
* Joshua Tromp scored an unbeaten 56* off 36 balls for Texas Super Kings.

**Turning Point:** Corey Anderson's incredible one-handed catch in the fifth over to dismiss Faf du Plessis, which helped stall the momentum of Texas Super Kings.

**Post-Match Quotes:**

* Corey Anderson: "It was moments like that which will help us going further... Faf has been playing well right through the tournament, so that catch helped us to stall some of the momentum away from them."
* Faf du Plessis: "I thought 185 was a par score here, we started off well (with the bat), it was important to break the match in the powerplay, but we lost quick wickets in the middle-overs, we did show a lot of fight in the back-end, but left too much in the end."

* The San Francisco Unicorns defeated the Texas Super Kings in the Eliminator round, securing their spot in the final.
* The Unicorns scored 200/6, led by Finn Allen's 101 off 53 balls, Josh Inglis' 37 off 25 balls, and Hassan Khan's 27 off 15 balls.
* The Texas Super Kings responded with 190/4, featuring Devon Conway's 62, Faf du Plessis' 45, and Joshua Trump's 56, but fell short by 10 runs.
* Hassan Khan excelled with the ball, taking one wicket and conceding 25 runs in four overs, while Haris Rauf struggled, going wicketless and conceding 43 runs.
* The San Francisco Unicorns will face the Washington Freedom in the MLC 2024 final on Sunday, July 28th, in Dallas.

The San Francisco Unicorns won a thrilling match against the Texas Super Kings by 10 runs, securing their spot in the finals of Major League Cricket 2024. The highlight of the match was Corey Anderson's spectacular catch, which lifted his team's spirits and dismissed Faf du Plessis. Finn Allen scored a century, his 101 runs off 53 balls helping the Unicorns set a target of 200 runs for 6 wickets. The Texas Super Kings replied with 190 runs for 4 wickets, but fell short. The San Francisco Unicorns will face the Washington Freedom in the finals on July 29 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Match Preview:**
The Washington Freedom will face the San Francisco Unicorns in the Play-Off 2 match of Major League Cricket 2024. The winner of this match will secure a spot in the final.

**Team Performance:**
Both teams have been strong performers in the tournament, with Washington Freedom finishing top of the league table with 11 points (5 wins, 1 loss) and a superb net run rate. San Francisco Unicorns also have 11 points (5 wins, 1 loss) but are second due to net run rate. Washington's openers Travis Head and Steve Smith are among the top three run-scorers, while Saurabh Netravalkar is the top wicket-taker.

**Match Details:**
The match will take place on July 26 at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, Dallas, Texas, with a live broadcast on Sony Sports Network, JioCinema App, and Website.

**Pitch and Weather Report:**
The pitch is suitable for batting, with scores of 180+ possible. Fast bowlers may find some movement early on, while medium pacers and quality spinners can be effective in the middle overs. The weather is expected to be humid with a temperature in the mid-20s, with some dew expected in the second innings.

**Predicted Playing XI:**
The predicted playing XI for Washington Freedom includes Travis Head, Steve Smith, and Saurabh Netravalkar, while San Francisco Unicorns may feature Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, and Corey Anderson.

**Head-to-Head Record:**
The two teams have played each other twice, with one win each.

**Dream11 Prediction:**
Washington Freedom are slight favourites to win this match, given their dominant performances throughout the tournament.

* The Washington Freedom have qualified for the final of the Major League Cricket tournament after defeating the San Francisco Unicorns in the playoff.
* The Freedom restricted the Unicorns to 145 in 19 overs and then chased down the score, winning by 7 wickets.
* Travis Head was the star of the show, scoring 77 off 44 balls with 3 sixes and 10 fours, while Glen Maxwell also contributed with a rapid 56 off 23 balls.
* The Freedom's dominant performance was set up by their bowlers, who bowled out the Unicorns for 145.
* The Unicorns struggled with inconsistency at the top of their order, with rising star Jake Fraser-McGurk failing to make an impact.
* The Washington Freedom finished top of the table in the regular season and are the team to beat in the final.
* The other finalist will be determined by the playoff game between the Texas Super Kings and the San Francisco Unicorns.

The article is about the upcoming Qualifier match in the Major League Cricket tournament, scheduled to be played between Washington Freedom (WAS) and San Francisco Unicorns (SF). It promises to provide an analysis of the player battles, player records, and head-to-head records between the two teams.

**Final Match Details**: The final match of MLC 2024 will be played between Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns on July 28 at Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, starting at 7:30 PM CT (6:00 AM IST on July 29). The match will be available to watch via live streaming and broadcast.

**Road to the Final**: Washington Freedom beat San Francisco Unicorns by seven wickets in the Qualifier match to reach the final directly, while San Francisco Unicorns won the Challenger match against Texas Super Kings to reach the final.

**Player Performance**: Saurabh Netravalkar tops the bowling charts with 14 wickets from six matches, while Travis Head and Steve Smith are among the top five run-getters in the tournament. Travis Head has scored five consecutive fifties, including an unbeaten 77 off 44 balls in the Qualifier match.

**Head-to-Head Record**: Washington Freedom has won two out of three matches against San Francisco Unicorns in the history of MLC.

**Players to Watch**: Rachin Ravindra, Marco Jansen, and Saurabh Netravalkar are key bowlers to watch out for, while Travis Head and Glenn Maxwell are crucial batsmen for Washington Freedom.

The Washington Freedom have qualified for the final of the MLC 2024 season by winning the Qualifier against the San Francisco Unicorns in Dallas. Led by the captain-coach duo of Steve Smith and Ricky Ponting, the team has been clinical and delivered gritty performances throughout the season.

In the league phase, the Freedom won five out of their seven matches, with notable wins against defending champions MI New York, Seattle Orcas, Los Angeles Knight Riders, and MI New York again. Their only loss came against San Francisco Unicorns in their last league match.

Key performers for the Freedom include Steve Smith, who shone with the bat and as captain, Saurabh Netravalkar, who consistently took wickets, and Travis Head, who scored two fifties. Other notable performers include Lockie Ferguson, Glenn Maxwell, Rachin Ravindra, Jasdeep Singh, and Marco Jansen.

In the Qualifier match, the Freedom won by seven wickets against San Francisco Unicorns, with Ravindra recording career-best figures and Head and Maxwell smashing eight sixes and 14 boundaries. The team is now within touching distance of their maiden MLC title.

* Tournament: Major League Cricket 2024
* Match: San Francisco Unicorns (SF) vs Texas Super Kings (TEX)
* Date: July 27, 2024 (Saturday)
* Time: 6:00 AM IST
* Venue: Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, Dallas

**Match Information:** 
The upcoming match is between Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns in the Major League Cricket tournament.

**Competitiveness:** 
Both teams have been preparing extensively to win, and their past encounters suggest a fierce competition.

**Anticipation:** 
Cricket enthusiasts worldwide are eagerly awaiting this match, which promises to be a nail-biting struggle from start to finish.

**Schedule:** 
The match is scheduled to start on [no specific date or time mentioned].

**Viewing Experience:** 
Viewers can expect a thrilling display of athletic skill and stay tuned for live updates on the match page.

**Significance:** 
The winner of this match will earn the right to be called victors, and the cricketing community will be keenly observing this encounter.

* The Challenger match is between San Francisco Unicorns and Texas Super Kings, with the winner advancing to the final to face Washington Freedom.
* San Francisco Unicorns are looking to bounce back from a defeat to Washington Freedom, relying on their batting lineup led by Finn Allen and Sanjay Krishnamurthi, and bowling attack featuring Pat Cummins and Hassan Khan.
* Texas Super Kings enter the match with high spirits after a convincing win over MI New York, boasting a strong batting lineup led by Faf du Plessis and Devon Conway, and a promising bowling attack featuring Zia-ul-Haq and Marcus Stoinis.
* The Grand Prairie Stadium pitch is expected to offer a balanced contest, with partly cloudy conditions and a chance of light rain showers forecasted.
* The toss prediction is that both teams will want to bat first, taking advantage of the batting-friendly conditions.
* The match prediction is that Texas Super Kings have a slight edge due to their momentum and strong batting lineup, but San Francisco Unicorns are capable of emerging victorious in what promises to be a closely fought contest.

**Match Preview:** The MLC 2024 playoffs begin with a thrilling encounter between Texas Super Kings and defending champions MI New York.

**Team Previews:**

* **MI New York:** Despite struggling for consistency, MI New York boast a strong batting lineup with Nicholas Pooran, Kieron Pollard, and Dewald Brevis. Their bowling attack, led by Rashid Khan, Kagiso Rabada, and Trent Boult, has the potential to be lethal.
* **Texas Super Kings:** The team has shown improvement in the latter part of the league stage and secured their playoff spot with a win over Seattle Orcas. Their batting lineup, led by Faf du Plessis and Devon Conway, has been consistent.

**Pitch and Weather Conditions:** The Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas has a flat pitch and short boundaries, favoring batsmen. Clear skies are expected with temperatures in the high twenties.

**Match Prediction:** The encounter is expected to be closely fought, but MI New York's experience and star power give them a slight edge. The predicted winner is MI New York.

The eliminator match between TEX and NY will take place on Thursday, 25th July 2024, at 06:00 AM IST at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas, as part of the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament. The match will be streamed live online only on the ESPN+ website and will not be broadcast on any other platform or channel in India.

The pitch at the Grand Prairie Stadium is currently balanced and favors pacers, with an average of 163 runs scored in the last 5 T20 matches. TEX has been performing well in their last 5 matches, while NY has not been consistent but won their last match.

**Match Details:**

* Date: July 24, 2024
* Time: 6:00 AM (PDT)
* Venue: Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas
* Match: Texas Super Kings (TSK) vs Seattle Orcas (SOR) in the 21st match of Major League Cricket 2024

**Team Previews:**

* Texas Super Kings (TSK) have a strong batting lineup featuring Devon Conway, Faf du Plessis, and Mitchell Santner, and a deep bowling attack with experience from Dwayne Bravo and Mohammad Mohsin.
* Seattle Orcas (SOR) rely heavily on Quinton de Kock for a strong start, but their bowling attack may lack depth compared to TSK.

**Score Prediction:**

* If TSK bat first, predicted score: 163+
* If SOR bat first, predicted score: 158+

**Winning Chances:**

* TSK winning chances: 62%
* SOR winning chances: 38%

**Match Prediction:**

* Predicted winner: Texas Super Kings
